item.title: Predict from various data in Python using Facebook Prophet, a time series prediction tool
item.description: >This article is [Greg Rafferty](https://towardsdatascience.com/@raffg?source=post_page-----29810eb57e66----------------------)Translatedfrom"[ForecastinginPythonwithFacebookProphet](https://towardsdatascience.com/forecasting-in-python-with-facebook-prophet-29810eb57e66)" published in November 2019 by Mr. .. This article is published with the permission of the original author. I’m Greg Rafferty, a data scientist in the Bay Area. You can also check the code used in this project from my github. In this article, I’ll show you how to use the Facebook Prophet prediction library to make a variety of predictions, and some advanced techniques to use your expertise to handle trend inconsistencies.
